sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID AND prot.id=#id#
SELECT * FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID AND prot.id=#id#
SELECT * FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID AND prot.piRunID = #id#
SELECT * FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID AND prot.piRunID = #id#
SELECT * FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID AND prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND idpProt.clusterID = #clusterId#
SELECT * FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID AND prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND idpProt.clusterID = #clusterId#
SELECT * FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID AND prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND idpProt.groupID = #groupId#
SELECT * FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID AND prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND idpProt.groupID = #groupId#

SELECT count(DISTINCT(idprot.groupID)) FROM IDPickerProtein AS idprot, msProteinInferProtein as prot WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = idprot.piProteinID
AND idprot.isParsimonious = #isParsimonious#
SELECT peptideGroupID FROM IDPickerGroupAssociation WHERE piRunID=#pinferId# AND proteinGroupID=#groupId#
SELECT DISTINCT idpProt.groupID FROM IDPickerProtein as idpProt, msProteinInferProtein as prot WHERE prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND idpProt.clusterID = #clusterId# AND prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID
SELECT DISTINCT idpProt.clusterID FROM IDPickerProtein as idpProt, msProteinInferProtein as prot WHERE prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID
SELECT count(*) FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.piRunID = #id# AND prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID AND idpProt.isParsimonious = 1
SELECT prot.id FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND idpProt.groupID = #groupId# AND prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID

SELECT prot.id, idpProt.groupID FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID
AND idpProt.isParsimonious = #isParsimonious#
SELECT count(*) FROM IDPickerGroupAssociation WHERE piRunID=#pinferId# AND proteinGroupID=#protGrpId# AND peptideGroupID=#peptGrpId#

SELECT prot.nrseqProteinID FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID
AND idpProt.isParsimonious = #isParsimonious#

SELECT id FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID
AND idpProt.isParsimonious = #isParsimonious#
ORDER BY idpProt.groupID ASC
SELECT id FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID ORDER BY idpProt.clusterID, idpProt.groupID ASC
SELECT id FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID ORDER BY idpProt.groupID ASC

SELECT id FROM msProteinInferProtein WHERE piRunID=#pinferId# AND coverage BETWEEN #minCoverage# AND #maxCoverage#
ORDER BY coverage ASC

SELECT prot.id AS proteinId, iprot.groupID AS proteinGroupId, prot.coverage AS coverage FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, IDPickerProtein AS iprot WHERE prot.id = iprot.piProteinID AND prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND coverage BETWEEN #minCoverage# AND #maxCoverage# ORDER BY proteinGroupId, coverage DESC

SELECT id FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID AND idpProt.nsaf >=#nsaf#
ORDER BY idpProt.nsaf ASC

SELECT prot.id AS proteinId, iprot.groupID AS proteinGroupId, iprot.nsaf AS nsaf FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, IDPickerProtein AS iprot WHERE prot.id = iprot.piProteinID AND prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND iprot.nsaf >=#nsaf# ORDER BY proteinGroupId, nsaf DESC

SELECT id FROM msProteinInferProtein WHERE piRunID=#pinferId#
AND userValidation IN $validationStatus$
ORDER BY userValidation ASC

SELECT prot.id, count(*) AS cnt FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch AS m, msProteinInferPeptide AS pept, msProteinInferIon AS ion, msProteinInferSpectrumMatch AS psm WHERE prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID AND idpProt.piProteinID = m.piProteinID AND m.piPeptideID = pept.id AND pept.id = ion.piPeptideID AND ion.id = psm.piIonID AND prot.piRunID = #pinferId# GROUP BY prot.id HAVING cnt BETWEEN #minSpectra# AND #maxSpectra#
ORDER BY cnt
, idpProt.groupID
ASC

SELECT prot.id, count(pept.id) AS cnt FROM (msProteinInferProtein AS prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch as m) LEFT JOIN ( msProteinInferPeptide AS pept ) ON (m.piPeptideID = pept.id
AND pept.uniqueToProtein = #uniqueToProtein#
) WHERE prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID AND prot.id = m.piProteinID
AND idpProt.isParsimonious = #isParsimonious#
GROUP BY prot.id HAVING cnt BETWEEN #minPeptides# AND #maxPeptides#
ORDER BY cnt
, idpProt.groupID
ASC

SELECT prot.id, count(ion.id) AS cnt FROM (msProteinInferProtein AS prot, IDPickerProtein as idpProt, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch as m) LEFT JOIN ( msProteinInferPeptide AS pept, msProteinInferIon AS ion ) ON (m.piPeptideID = pept.id AND pept.id = ion.piPeptideID
AND pept.uniqueToProtein = #uniqueToProtein#
) WHERE prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND prot.id = idpProt.piProteinID AND prot.id = m.piProteinID
AND idpProt.isParsimonious = #isParsimonious#
GROUP BY prot.id HAVING cnt BETWEEN #minPeptides# AND #maxPeptides#
ORDER BY cnt
, idpProt.groupID
ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO IDPickerGroupAssociation ( piRunID, proteinGroupID, peptideGroupID) values(#pinferId#, #protGrpId#, #peptGrpId#)
INSERT INTO IDPickerProtein ( piProteinID, isParsimonious, clusterID, groupID, nsaf) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE IDPickerProtein SET clusterID=#clusterId#, groupID=#groupId#, isParsimonious=#isParsimonious#, nsaf=#nsaf# WHERE piProteinID=#id#
